allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix mobile horizontal overflow and wire navbar section links

- Add overflow-x: hidden to html and body in globals.css to block horizontal scroll on all screens
- Add overflow-hidden to AboutSection which was the only section missing it
- Add overflowX: clip to ProcessSection outer section to contain the 300vw rail without breaking sticky positioning
- Update navbar links to match actual section IDs: About \(#about\), Services \(#services\), Process \(#process\), Reviews \(#evidence\)
- Add id attributes to AboutSection, ServicesSection, and ProcessSection

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix ProcessSection sticky scroll broken by overflow-x: clip

Removed overflowX: clip from the outer section â€” it was disrupting the
sticky scroll container even though clip is theoretically safe. The
global overflow-x: hidden on html/body is sufficient to prevent
horizontal overflow without touching the sticky ancestor.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
